# SHA256 Checksums for Nodoka v0.2.0 Installers
#
# Verify downloaded installers match these checksums:
#   macOS:   shasum -a 256 Nodoka-0.2.0.dmg
#   Linux:   sha256sum nodoka_0.2.0_amd64.deb
#   Windows: certutil -hashfile nodoka-0.2.0-x64.msi SHA256
#
# Note: This file will be regenerated by CI/CD with all three platform
# checksums after the GitHub release is created and all installers are built.

82a8c3d1233dffbf38c82b5ffd4ba9b31f7a0c3498ca913130194962f2a7c9f9  Nodoka-0.2.0.dmg
